org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart

Class DefaultChartTitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart.DefaultChartTitle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultAbstractTitle, IsDefaultFontContainer, IsDefaultPluginElement, IsDefaultTitle

    public final class DefaultChartTitle
extends Object
implements IsDefaultTitle
    Defaults for title option element, based on chart type.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
